Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(cookie-generator\): Add live site screenshot preview via Microlink

When user enters their website URL, the cookie banner preview now shows
an actual screenshot of their site as background instead of a generic
skeleton. Falls back to skeleton on error or empty input.

- New reusable hook `use-site-screenshot` with 1.2s debounce, request
  cancellation via requestId, and URL normalization. Can be plugged into
  widget editors later without changes.
- BannerPreview renders screenshot when available; loading overlay on
  first fetch, subtle "Обновляется…" badge on re-fetch.
- Address bar in preview frame updates to show the actual domain.
- Uses Microlink free tier \(50 req/day\) — no API key needed.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
